REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1720 reute r f BC-ROGERS-<ROG>-SEES-1ST 03-26 0100

TEXT.TITLE: ROGERS <ROG> SEES 1ST QTR NET UP SIGNIFICANTLY
TEXT.BODY: Rogers Corp said first quarter earnings will be up significantly from earnings of 114,000 dlrs or four cts share for the same quarter last year. The company said it expects revenues for the first quarter to be "somewhat higher" than revenues of 32.9 mln dlrs posted for the year-ago quarter. Rogers said it reached an agreement for the sale of its molded switch circuit product line to a major supplier. The sale, terms of which were not disclosed, will be completed early in the second quarter, Rogers said. Reuter
